sql.value: select ID, NAME, CLASS_NAME, CORN_EXPRESSION, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVE from sche_job where #[and NAME = :name] #[and CLASS_NAME = :className] #[and ACTIVE = :active] and DELETE_STATUS = 1
